org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors

Class AbstractSensor<TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors.AbstractSensor<TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    TYPE - type of this sensor
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractManualSensor, AbstractStackSensor, DurationSensor

    public abstract class AbstractSensor<TYPE>
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Master abstract base class for sensors, implements AutoCloseable in order to be usable as try-with-resource structure
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    afarre
    See Also:
    AutoCloseable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected MetricsService metricService
      The current metrics service that will be used in this sensor instance
      protected static Supplier<MetricsService> metricsServiceSupplier
      Supplier function to retrieve the current MetricService instance to use
      protected String name
      Measured metric name
      protected MeasureReducer<TYPE> reducer
      The reducer to use with this sensor
      protected boolean skip
      The current skip status (if this measure must not be registered)
      protected LocalDateTime timestamp
      The timestamp when this sensor started measure

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AbstractSensor(MeasureReducer<TYPE> _reducer, Optional<MetricsService> _service, String _name, Object... _args)
      Abstract sensor constructor with the given parameters

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the sensor and register the current measure if present into the current MetricsService

      Retrieve current sensor measure

      Retrieve current sensor metric metricService

      Retrieve sensor metric name

      Retrieve current sensor skip flag status

      Retrieve if the given measure must be ignored
      protected void registerMeasure(TYPE _measure)
      Register measure in the current MetricsService
      static void registerMetricsServiceSupplier(Supplier<MetricsService> _metricsServiceSupplier)
      Register a new MetricsService Supplier in order to be used (should be called before any sensor is created, otherwise these sensors will register the measures into the internal singleton)
      void skip()
      Flag this sensor to ignore any taken measure (not register in metric)

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractSensor

        protected AbstractSensor(MeasureReducer<TYPE> _reducer,
                         Optional<MetricsService> _service,
                         String _name,
                         Object... _args)
        Abstract sensor constructor with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        _reducer - reducer for this sensor (mandatory)
        _service - metrics metricService (optional) if no provided, a singleton instance of DefaultMetricsServiceImpl is created
        _name - metric name (mandatory)
        _args - placeholders for metric name (optional)
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if metricsServiceSupplier returns null instance or _name is null
        See Also:
        DefaultMetricsServiceImpl, MeasureReducer, MetricsService

        Retrieve if the given measure must be ignored

        public void close()
        Close the sensor and register the current measure if present into the current MetricsService
        Specified by:

      • registerMetricsServiceSupplier

        public static void registerMetricsServiceSupplier(Supplier<MetricsService> _metricsServiceSupplier)
        Register a new MetricsService Supplier in order to be used (should be called before any sensor is created, otherwise these sensors will register the measures into the internal singleton)
        Parameters:
        _metricsServiceSupplier - metric metricService supplier
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if null _metricsServiceSupplier
        See Also:
        MetricsServiceSingleton, MetricsService
